channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: ok i have two of the same npcs spawned i want both of them to say something diff how do i do that????

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

go into npchandler.java and search for something one of your guys says then copy paste another and just switch ill give you an example of mine if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 17) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "b1b5c4p3 p00ns!!"; }
replace the b1b5c4p3 to what u want it to say and change the 636 to your npc id. The 50 is the timer make it 1 and they never shut up.

Read full topic
